SEEALSO: SpreadsheetGetCellComment, SpreadsheetFormatCell, SpreadsheetGetCellFormula, SpreadsheetGetCellValue, SpreadsheetMergeCells, SpreadsheetSetCellComment, SpreadsheetSetCellValue
DESCRIPTION: Specifies the formula for an Excel spreadsheet object cell.
EXAMPLE:
The following line sets the formula for the cell at row 2 column 11 to be the sum of the cells in the columnâ€™s rows 1 through 12.
The following example sets a cell formula, and gets the cell formula and value.
<cfscript> //Create a new Excel spreadsheet object. theSheet=SpreadsheetNew(); //Set the values of column 3 rows 1-10 to the row number. for (i=1; i<= 10; i=i+1) SpreadsheetSetCellValue(theSheet,i,i,3); //Set the fomula for the cell in row 11 column 3 to be the sum of //Columns 1-10. SpreadsheetSetCellFormula(theSheet,"SUM(C1:C10)",11,3); //Get the formula from the Excel spreadsheet object. theValue=SpreadsheetGetCellFormula(theSheet,11,3); //Get the value of row 11 column 5 from the Excel spreadsheet object. theValue=SpreadsheetGetCellValue(theSheet,11,3); </cfscript> <cfoutput> Row 11, Column 3 value: #SpreadsheetGetCellValue(theSheet,11,3)#<br /> Row 11, Column 3 formula: #SpreadsheetGetCellFormula(theSheet,11,3)#<br /> </cfoutput>
USAGE: This function replaces any existing value, including specific entered values.

Parameter.DESCRIPTION: The Excel spreadsheet object to which to add the comment.
The row number of the cell to which to add the formula.
The column number of the cell to which to add the formula.
